pkgmetadata.longdescription: Random Forest with Multivariate Longitudinal Predictors // Based on random forest principle, 'DynForest' is able to include multiple longitudinal predictors to provide individual predictions. Longitudinal predictors are modeled through the random forest. The methodology is fully described for a survival outcome in: Devaux, Helmer, Genuer Proust-Lima (2022) doi: 10.48550/arXiv.2208.05801.
